modName: My Ningheim and Nord Character Presets for Racemenu or Sculpt files
summary:
Sorry for my bad English. It is not my native language.

These files allow you to have charakter faces that look exectly like mine and you can use them for what ever you feel like. There are 3 diffrent faces so far you can choose for Nord and Ningheim races. I do also upload the files so you could use sculpt option in Racemenu or ECE so
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Requirements[/u][/b]:

There s no such thing[b] just [/b]mods that make it might look a bit better. for example if you want my warpaints you need raven warpaints. If you want the hair you need ks hairdos and the hdt version of it. Some eyes are the Eyes of aber or true eyes. You can take what eyes you want anyways.

Feel free to ask me anything if your having problems!!!
I am not the best in modding and computer things but I ll try my best to help as good as I can.
[u]
[b]Installation[/b][/u]:
If you Install a preset for Racemenu drop the file manually in the Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets folder. If you do not have this folder yet go into your game save any preset and leave the game.

If you just wanna install the sculpt files for an other race or ECE then just download the sculpt files of the Character you want and install int manually into E:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen folder.

I'd also appreciate if you would check out some of my other pictures on my profil!
Have a nice day Ladies and Gentlemen and Merry Christmas!!!

[u]Help![/u]
Im looking for someone whod be willing to make some cool Followers out of my Presets. I tried myself but sadly it never worked out the way it should with, weird bugs, so let me know if your intrested ;)

[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]:
Raccoondance for helping me at christmas time cause I have no clue! :D
